page.title: 14THE HOTEL CHEF
page.content: A chef who works at the Metropole Hotel starts work at 9.30AM,he finishes for lunch at 2.30PM and starts again at 5.30 until 8.30PM.He has 8 hours sleep a day.He is a Protestant and frequently goes to church.He works 5.5 days a week, excluding Sunday night and Wednesday. He wears a uniform and after work usually goes into the hotel bar for a drink.It is mostly elderly people who stay at the hotel and he gets both compliments and complaints about his cooking.He himself only has one proper meal a day except on Wednesday when he has two.The most exciting moment in his life was when he became a father, his most disappointing moment was when he was made redundant,but this only lasted 3 months.He has worked in restaurants and hotels for many years but always manages an annual holiday.
